scripts.build: tsc --module es2015 --outDir dist/esm && tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/commonjs --declaration --declarationDir dist/types
scripts.generate: protoc -I protobuf --es_out ./src --es_opt=target=ts google/protobuf/descriptor.proto usermessages.proto cstrike15_gcmessages.proto cstrike15_usermessages.proto gcsdk_gcmessages.proto demo.proto networkbasetypes.proto network_connection.proto engine_gcmessages.proto gameevents.proto netmessages.proto steammessages.proto
